name: Live! 3DO Magazine CD-ROM #01
overview: Includes demo versions of games: Doctor Hauzer, Virtual Horror - Norowareta Tachi, Waialae no Kiseki, Fire Ball !!, Toki o Koeta Tegami - The letter that came over time and Ultraman Powered. This disc also includes a Movie about: Chiki Chiki Machine Mou-Race, Tetsujin, Theatre Wars - Goraku no Dendou, Life Stage - Virtual House, Nontan to Issho - Nohara de Asobo, Yamamura Misa Suspense - Kyoto Kurama Sansou Satsujin Jiken, Burning Soldier, Kurokishi Kamen the no and Virtual Quest - Pharaoh no Fuuin.
